utilitiesÂ¶

utilities contains useful, non-physics functions used in DarkHistory.

Functions

arrays_equal(ndarray_list) Check if the arrays contained in ndarray_list are equal.
div_ignore_by_zero(a, b[, val]) Divides a by b, returning val if a divide-by-zero error occurs.
is_log_spaced(arr) Checks if arr is a log-spaced array.
